unit.name: Vampire Lord
unit.description: Magic: A Vampire Lord is a Level 3 wizard. He must choose 1-2 PM and 1-3 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 150p of magic items (incl. Bloodline Powers). Special Rules: The Hunger

unit.name: Ghoul King
unit.description: Magic: A Ghoul King is a Level 3 wizard. He must choose 1-2 PM and 1-3 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 150p of magic items (incl. Bloodline Powers). Special Rules: Regeneration (5+), Immortal Rage, The Hunger

unit.name: Master Necromancer
unit.description: Magic: A M. Necromancer is a Level 4 wizard. He must choose 2-3 PM and 1-4 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 100p of magic items. Special Rules: none

unit.name: Lahmian Vampire Countess
unit.description: Magic: A Lahmian Vampire Countess is a Level 3 wizard. She must choose 1-2 PM and 1-3 BM spells. Mount: Coven Throne. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 100p of magic items (incl. Bloodline Powers). Point Cost: 475p (200p for the Vampire, 275p for the Coven Throne). Special Rules: The Hunger. Coven Throne: Chariot: 5+AS, 2 Pallid Handmaiden and 1 Spirit Horde. Special Rules: Large Target, Spectral Steeds, Ward Save (5+), Terror, Impact Hits (D3+1), Coven Throne, ASF (Pallid Handmaidens only)

unit.name: Blood Dragon Lord
unit.description: Magic: A Blood Dragon Lord is a Level 1 wizard. He must choose 0-1 PM and 0-1 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. May take up to 150p of magic items (incl. Bloodline Powers). Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Necrarch Vampire Lord
unit.description: Magic: A Necrarch Vampire Lord is a Level 4 wizard. He must choose 1-2 PM and 2-4 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 150p of magic items (incl. Bloodline Powers). Special Rules: The Hunger.

unit.name: Wight Lord
unit.description: Equipment: Wight Blade and heavy armour. May take up to 100p of magic items. Special Rules: Shambling

unit.name: Wight Battle Standard Bearer
unit.description: Equipment: Wight Blade and heavy armour. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: Shambling, BSB

unit.name: Wight Seneschal
unit.description: Equipment: Wight Blade and heavy armour. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: Shambling

unit.name: Vampire
unit.description: Magic: A Vampire is a Level 2 wizard. He must choose 0-1 PM and 0-1 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 75p of magic items (incl.Bloodline Powers). Special Rules: The Hunger

unit.name: Necromancer
unit.description: Magic: A Necromancer is a Level 2 wizard. He must choose 1-2 PM and 0-2 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. May take up to 50p of magic items. Special Rules: none

unit.name: Wraith
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Ethereal, Terror

unit.name: Banshee
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Ethereal, Terror, Ghostly Howl

unit.name: Skeleton Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Shambling, Block (shield).

unit.name: Skeleton Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Shambling, Anti-Cav(spear).

unit.name: Zombie
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling.

unit.name: Ghoul
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Light Infantry, Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Dire Wolf
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Light Cavalry, Slavering Charge.

unit.name: Grave Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Wight Blades, heavy armour and shield. The unit may replace their shields with great weapons or halberds for free. Special Rules: Shambling, Block (shield).

unit.name: Black Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Skeletal Steed. Equipment: Wight Blades, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Spectral Steeds.

unit.name: Bat Swarm
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Skirmishers (10")

unit.name: Fell Bat
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Unit.

unit.name: Spirit Host
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Ethereal, Light Infantry.

unit.name: Corpse Cart
unit.description: Monster: Corpse Cart, 1 Corpsemaster and 1 Zombie Horde. Equipment: The Corpsemaster is armed with a hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Impact Hits (D3+1), Regeneration (4+), Vigour Mortis.

unit.name: Vargheist
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Frenzy, Flying Unit.

unit.name: Crypt Horror
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Regeneration (5+), Poisoned Attacks (1).

unit.name: Hex Wraith
unit.description: Mount: Skeletal Steed. Equipment: Great Weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Light Cavalry, Spectral Steeds, Demonic Ward Save (4+), Soulstriders, Spectral Hunters

unit.name: Cairn Wraith
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Ethereal, Skirmish, Terror.

unit.name: Varghulf
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Hatred, Regeneration (4+), March Blocker, Bestial Fury.

unit.name: Terrorgheist
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Death Shriek.

unit.name: Blood Knight
unit.description: Mount: Barded Nightmare. Equipment: Lances, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry, Frenzy, Martial Honour. Note: The minimum base size for Blood Knight models is 50mm x 75mm.

unit.name: Black Coach
unit.description: Chariot: 4+AS, 1 Wraith, 2 Skeletal Steeds Equipment: The Wraith is armed with a great weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Spectral Steeds, Terror, Demonic Ward Save (5+), Evocation of Death

unit.name: Mortis Engine
unit.description: Chariot: 5+AS, 1 Corpsemaster, 1 Banshee Swarm and 1 Spirit Horde. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Impact Hits (D3+1), Large Target, Spectral Steeds, Terror, Regeneration (5+), Ghostly Howl, The Reliquary

mount.name: Barded Skeletal Steed
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Shambling, Spectral Steed

mount.name: Barded Nightmare
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none

mount.name: Winged Nightmare
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror

mount.name: Zombie Dragon
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (5+), Pestilential Breath

mount.name: Terrorgheist
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Regeneration (6+), Death Shriek

item.name: Armour of Bone
item.description: 5+AS. The armour crumbles on first failed armour save (or wound with no AS). The wound that causes the armour to crumble is discarded. If it was a multi-wound hit, the model suffers one wound less.

item.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
item.description: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence as well as the range for units able to march is extended to 18".

item.name: BM Curse of Years (11+)
item.description: Hex, Range 24", RIP. When the spell is successfully cast as well as at the start of each players magic phase, roll a D6 for each model in the target unit, on a "6" the respective model loses 1 wound with no AS. Has no effect on character models..

item.name: BM Gaze of Nagash (9+)
item.description: MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Hand of Dust (5+)
item.description: One enemy unit in btb with the caster suffers D6 S4 hits

item.name: BM Raise Dead (12+)
item.description: Create a new unit of Skeleton Warriors consisting of 2D6+3 rank and file models completely within 12" of the caster and no closer than 1" to enemy units. The front rank of the unit has to consist of exactly 5 models. This unit is worth 100 Victory Points.

item.name: BM Rise of the Bloodmoon (8+)
BM Rise o.t. Bloodmoon (8+)
item.description: RIP, enemy units gain no benefit from "Inspiring Presence" and "Hold Your Ground!"

item.name: BM Steal Soul (7+)
item.description: Target one enemy unit within 12", the unit suffers 1 wound with no AS, allocated like shooting. The caster regains 1 wound if the target lost the wound, i.e. wounds saved with ward saves cannot be drained but wounds regained by regeneration are eligible.

item.name: BM Unnerving Whispers (8+)
BM Unnerving Whispers
item.description: Hex, Range 18", needs LOS, target unit must take a panic test (Units that are Immune to Psychology are immune to this spell).

item.name: BSB
item.description: Units within 12" of the BSB lose one less wound from Crumbling

item.name: Balefire
item.description: Enemy spells cast wizards within 24" of one or more balefires suffer -1 to cast (PM and BM).

item.name: Banner of Barrows
item.description: Unit rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s in cc. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Banner of Dead Legion
item.description: Bearer and unit always count as outnumbering when they win a combat for the purpose of deciding if the break test modifier gets doubled or not.

item.name: Banner of Doom
item.description: Bearer and his unit get Ward Save (5+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks

item.name: Bat Form
item.description: The vampire can Fly. Models on foot only.

item.name: Beguile
item.description: At the start of each cc phase one model in btb (Vampire players choice) has to take a Ld test. If failed that model may not attack the vampire that turn. Has no effect on models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Bestial Fury
item.description: Opponents do not get the flank/rear bonus CR against this unit.

item.name: Black Axe of Krell
item.description: Great weapon. Any model that has suffered 1+ wounds from the axe has to roll a D6 at the start of every magic phase: on a roll of 1-2 the model suffers one additional wound with no AS.

item.name: Black Periapt
item.description: Allows the bearer to save one unused PD or DD of his pool in each magic phase. At the start of the next magic phase roll a D6: on a 4+ the die can be used in this magic phase, on a 1-3 the die is lost.

item.name: Blade Master
item.description: Model in btb loses 1A, Vampire may choose which model and which attack

item.name: Blood Drinker
item.description: The bearer gains the special rule The Hunger that works on a 5+ instead of a 6.

item.name: Book of Arkhan
item.description: When the bearer casts Vanhels Danse Macabre he may choose to affect all friendly units within 6" of the target unit.

item.name: Cloak of Mist and Shadows
item.description: Bearer is Ethereal.

item.name: Coven Throne
item.description: Coven Throne is a Chariot which grants the Vampire riding on the Coven Throne the following special rules: - Ward Save (5+) - Battle of Wills: Enemy units in btb suffer -1WS, also models that are shooting at the Coven Throne suffer -1BS. - Scrying Pool (PM 2/5+): Augment, self. This model rerolls to-hit and to-wound rolls of natural 1s in cc until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on impact hits.

item.name: Crown of the Damned
item.description: Ward Save (4+), bearer is subject to stupidity (even if immune to psychology)

item.name: Curse of the Revenant
item.description: Regeneration (4+)

item.name: Cursed Book
item.description: Bearer and unit he is with are -1 to hit in close combat.

item.name: Cursed Shield of Moursillon
Cursed Shield of Moursil
item.description: Shield, Model in btb loses 1A, bearer may choose which model and which attack

item.name: Dark Acolyte
item.description: +1 PD every magic phase, may only be used by the Vampire.

item.name: Death Shriek
item.description: Like Ghostly Howl, but number of hits may be rerolled.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Domination
item.description: At the start of each cc phase one model in btb (Vampire players choice) has to take a Ld test. If failed, that model may not attack and all attacks against this model hit automatically that turn. (If used on a rank and file model, attacks need to be allocated. There is no overkill!). Has no effect on models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Ethereal
item.description: The model/unit has magical attacks, can move through obstacles and any terrain without penalties and is immune to non-magical attacks. Ethereal units can only be joined by Ethereal character models.

item.name: Evocation of Death
item.description: The model regains one wound for each model killed. Immediately apply the wound when a model is killed.

item.name: Flayed Hauberk
item.description: 2+ AS, cannot be improved.

item.name: Ghostly Howl
item.description: Ranged attack that can be used in the shooting phase. This attack can also be used in cc against one unit in btb with the model using this attack. If the target is within 8" roll 2D6+2 and subtract the Ld of the target. Use the Ld value the unit would use for psychology tests (i.e. the highest of the unit, incl. modifiers, inspiring presence, etc.). The difference is the number of S5 no AS hits the unit takes (a negative result fails to do any hits). If the target is immune to psychology all successful to-wound rolls have to be rerolled. Hits count as magical.

item.name: Hell Banner
item.description: Bearer and unit cause Terror

item.name: Immortal Rage
item.description: Model rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s in cc.

item.name: Infecting Claws
item.description: Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Innocence Lost
item.description: ASF

item.name: Master Conjurer
item.description: +1 to cast spells (PM and BM)

item.name: Master Strike
item.description: Killing Blow

item.name: Master of the Black Arts
item.description: Spell Ranges increased by 6", has no effect on spells without range

item.name: Mastermind
item.description: The general of the Vampire Counts army has to be a wizard and is the mastermind of the undead army, which has severe consequences should he be killed. At the end of the phase the general of the Vampire Counts army is killed (after possible regeneration saves, i.e. when the model is removed from play) make a Ld-test for each unit in the army. Each unit loses a number of wounds equal to the amount their respective test was failed by. There are no saves of any kind allowed vs wounds suffered in this way. Characters automatically pass this test and never suffer wounds in this way.

item.name: Necronomicon
item.description: When the bearer casts Invocation of Nehek at a unit of Skeletons or Zombies, he may choose to affect all friendly units of Skeletons or Zombies within 6" of the target unit. If 3 or more units including the target unit are affected by this spell then roll a D6 (after the effects of the spell have been resolved): on a roll of 1 the Necronomicon crumbles to dust and cannot be used anymore.

item.name: Obsidian Amulet
item.description: Magic Resistance (1)

item.name: PM Hellish Vigour 2/5+
PM Hellish Vigour 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", a unit with the Shambling trait doubles its initiative and gets +1 to to-hit rolls in cc until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: PM Invokation of Nehek 2/6+
PM Invokation of Nehek 3/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", targets one unit - Raise - 1D6: Skeletons - 1D6+1: Zombies - 1D3: Grave Guard, Dire Wolves, Ghouls - 1: all other single-wound models - Multi-wound models regain (heal) 1W but no additional models can be created Only rank and file models can be raised, i.e. no command group models. Raised models are equipped like the rest of the target unit. If the target unit comprises 5 or more models, raised models are placed in the back of the unit. In this way the ranks of a unit can be increased but not the number of files. If the unit comprises less than 5 models, raised models have to be used to create a rank of 5 models (inlc. character models) first (if possible). Additional models are then used to create additional ranks. Models that cannot be placed because of impassable terrain or enemy units within 1" are lost. Enemy units that are in BTB with the target unit are ignored for this purpose but models can only be placed if there is enough space, i.e. units are not moved to make space. - Has no effect on character models. - May increase unit above starting unit size but not above max unit size (see unit entry). - This spell cannot be lost through a miscast. - Models raised by this spell are not worth any extra VP. Use the original unit size to determine VP.

item.name: PM Vanhels Dance Macabre 2/5+
PM Vanhels Dance Macabre 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18". Can only be cast on units with the Shambling trait (but may include character models without the Shambling trait). The unit may move up to 8" but may not charge. Each unit may only benefit from VDM once per magic phase.

item.name: Pestilential Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S3, Poisoned Attacks (1)

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Precision Strike
item.description: AP (1)

item.name: Quickblood
item.description: Dodge (5+)

item.name: Red Fury
item.description: Frenzy

item.name: Ring of the Night
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Screaming Banner
item.description: Enemy units taking fear tests caused by this unit roll one additional dice and discard the lowest.

item.name: Shambling
item.description: Unit may not march, unless within 12" of the general at the start of the movement phase. Units can still be march blocked.

item.name: Skull Staff
item.description: At the beginning of the bearers magic phase, the opponent has to reveal all magic items within 12". In addition the bearer may reroll rolls on the Miscast Table.

item.name: Slavering Charge
item.description: +1S on the charge

item.name: Soul Strike
item.description: Magical Attacks

item.name: Soulstriders
item.description: The unit can move through enemy units in the Remaining Moves phase if it is able to end its move outside of 1" of enemy units. Further, the unit may attack a single enemy unit that it moved through in the Remaining Moves phase. The attacked unit suffers a number of S5 hits equal to the number of Hex Wraith models in the unit. Hits are treated as close combat hits and distributed like shooting. Casualties caused in this way do not cause panic tests.

item.name: Spectral Hunters
item.description: All attacks by the unit count as magical. Cannot be joined by character models.

item.name: Spectral Steed
Spectral Steeds
item.description: The unit moves through obstacles and any terrain without suffering movement penalties or damage from the terrain. The unit cannot end its movement in impassable terrain.

item.name: Staff of Damnation
item.description: When the bearer casts Hellish Vigour he may choose to affect all friendly units within 6" of the target unit.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Summon Bats
item.description: In its own Remaining Moves phase the vampire may summon 1 Bat Swarm. The unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit). One use only. Unit is worth 50VP.

item.name: Summon Ghouls
item.description: In its own Remaining Moves phase the vampire may summon D3 Ghouls. The unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit). One use only. Unit is worth 50VP.

item.name: Summon Wolves
item.description: In its own Remaining Moves phase the vampire may summon D3 Dire Wolves. The unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit). One use only. Unit is worth 50VP.

item.name: Sword of Kings
item.description: Killing Blow that works on a 5+ instead of a 6.

item.name: Talisman of Protection
item.description: Ward Save (6+)

item.name: The Awakening
item.description: The vampire raises 1 additional Skeleton/Zombie each time it casts Invocation of Nehek on a unit of Skeletons/Zombies.

item.name: The Hunger
item.description: Roll a die for each model killed by this model: regain 1W for each 6 rolled. Immediately roll when a model is killed and apply the result.

item.name: The Reliquary
item.description: Reliquarys Dark Aura (PM 3/5+): Augment, all friendly units within 12" of this model get Regeneration (6+). Units with Regeneration improve their Regeneration save by +1 instead, to a maximum of 4+. Has no effect on character models. The effect lasts until the casters next magic phase. This spell cannot be lost through a miscast.

item.name: Tomb Blade
item.description: If the bearer joined a unit of Skeletons or Zombies, each kill of a 1W model with this weapon creates 1 new Skeleton/Zombie for the unit he joined. Else the weapon counts as a magical hand weapon with no further effects.

item.name: Transfix
item.description: At the start of each cc phase one model in btb (Vampire players choice) has to take a Ld test. If failed that model may not attack that turn. Has no effect on models that are immune to psychology.

item.name: Undead
item.description: - Immune to Psychology - Crumbling: When an undead unit loses combat it suffers a number of wounds equal to the break test modifier, there is no break test, i.e. undead units never break from combat. Character models in units are only affected if the unit is destroyed and there are unallocated wounds left. In this case wounds are distributed evenly between the character models (randomise odd wounds). There are no saves of any kind allowed vs wounds suffered in this way. - Cause Fear - Undead must choose Hold as charge response, i.e. they may not Stand and Shoot.

item.name: Unholy Cynosure
item.description: Can reroll one die used to cast a spell (PM and BM). May force irresistible force or prevent a miscast. One use only.

item.name: Vigour Mortis
item.description: When this model is the target of Vanhels Danse Macabre or Hellish Vigour, the effect of the spell affects all Zombie units within 6" of this model (in addition to the model itself). Also if a Zombie unit within 6" of this model becomes the target of Invocation of Nehek, 1 additional model is raised.

item.name: Wailing Helm
item.description: +1 AS, bearer causes Terror

item.name: Walking Death
item.description: +1CR if the vampire is in cc. Has no effect if the Vampire joined a unit. Models on foot only.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Wight Blade
item.description: Killing Blow, magical attacks

item.name: Wolf Form
item.description: The vampire has M9. Models on foot only.

item.name: Wristband of Black Gold
item.description: Ward Save (3+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks

item.name: Great Weapon (removes BLOCK)
item.description: Replaces Shield, +2S, Always strikes last, Two-handed

item.name: Halberds (removes BLOCK)
item.description: Replaces Shield, +1S, Two-handed
